channel.title: Succesful way of Eating a Cookie
channel.description:
Well first off.
You grab your Cookie and then Take off its Wrapper and then put it in the Microwave. Next press Time and then the 3 and then the 0 and then hit Start once its Finished grab it out and put you Finger on Top and if it feels nice and Warm and Soft inside EAT THE HELL OUT OF IT!
...Genius
thats for todays lesson on how to eat Cookies the right way :)
Notes: The Chocolate in the Cookie should be Melted The Cookies Shouldn't be in the Microwave for to Long If you feel a very very very Hot Feeling on your Tounge when Eating the Cookie then its to Hot If your Cookie is Black when you Pull it out then you Put it in for to Long You should Probably use the Big Cookies and not the Small ones.
Post how you Prepare you Cookies if you like :P

item.title: Succesful way of Eating a Cookie
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Well first off.

You grab your Cookie and then Take off its Wrapper and then put it in the Microwave.
Next press Time and then the 3 and then the 0 and then hit Start once its Finished
grab it out and put you Finger on Top and if it feels nice and Warm and Soft inside EAT THE HELL OUT OF IT!

…Genius

thats for todays lesson on how to eat Cookies the right way

Notes: The Chocolate in the Cookie should be Melted
The Cookies Shouldn’t be in the Microwave for to Long
If you feel a very very very Hot Feeling on your Tounge when Eating the Cookie then its to Hot
If your Cookie is Black when you Pull it out then you Put it in for to Long
You should Probably use the Big Cookies and not the Small ones.

Post how you Prepare you Cookies if you like
